extendedInfo.description: Work Shifts is a simple app that allows you to keep track of your work shifts.Features:-Add, Edit, and Delete Shifts-Add, Edit, and Delete Preset Shifts-Add, Edit, and Delete Notes-Add your schedule for weeks in advance-Keep your previous schedules-Highlights the current day-Easily switch to current week-Widget that shows next up-coming shift-Icon Notification allows you to easily switch to app-Show your pay days-Show how many hours you work each week-Change the start day of the week-Format the date & time-Backup and Restore the database to the sd card

reviews.title: Vital app
reviews.comment: This app is vital to my life and saves me a lot of hassle. Just wish it could work out how much overtime I\'d done!
reviews.author: hel0is0heaven

reviews.title: Really good app
reviews.comment: Really easy to use and simple! Only suggestions would be automatically calculating pay, showing how many hours you work on a specific day and the ability to change the style/colour of the widget
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pure awesome!
reviews.comment: I work for an Oilfield Service company and I\'m constantly going from location to location, 3 hours here, 5 hours there. This app has really helped me with my shifts and where all I\'ve been throughout the week. Makes my time figuring so much easier. Thanks!
reviews.author: Ryan Rodrigues

reviews.title: Works well usually
reviews.comment: Overall it works well and is just what I need and up until now I haven\'t encountered any problems. However the other day the app is now telling me I already have a shift scheduled for one day when I haven\'t added anything and there is no shift displayed. I need to add a shift and this error will not let me do so, so I have the shift as a note but this doesn\'t add to mht hours or show up on the widget. Fix?
reviews.author: Caitlin Manning

reviews.title: Awesome but....
reviews.comment: this is a great app for tracking your hours (trust me i went and tried quite a few but this one kept me coming backing with its simplicity. so easy to use and great features..BUT i really wish it would have a feature that totals your pay of that week as you input your hours, maybe placed next to the total hours in the top corner. once that features is in its FIVE STARS from me :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice and simple
reviews.comment: I like it so far, but Still need more options. I would like to see the option where you can see the whole month in a glance and more colors. I had bought two other ones that i finally finish erasing them from my phone because They were too complicated and confusing, but this one so far i really recommended it by its simplicity, if you are looking for an schedule easy to set up this is the one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Idea
reviews.comment: In the status bar  you should  be able  to see  your shift or a  count down intil your shift.   Other than  that i  love this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MARCOS GS2
reviews.comment: Is perfect...u can add..how many hours work p/monthly? ...please please...all my frienda using now... !!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best For What It Does
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried many similar apps and have been greatly disappointed.  This is a simple but competent app for keeping up with hours worked.  Some suggestions for improvement: 1) Show total hours worked per day.  2) Create a quick entry option for people like me who get paid in 6 minute increments.  3) Consider adding wage amount for hourly employees to include overtime and shift differential pay options.  But with all things considered, this is a solid app.
reviews.author: Donald Lightkep

reviews.title: Like it so far.
reviews.comment: I\'m enjoying it so far. I like the preset shifts because I work the same shifts and multiple jobs. I can\'t complain at all. If anything I would like to see a calendar view to look at the whole month at once.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost a year now. Updates?
reviews.comment: Any chance of seeing some updates?  A dark theme at least for the widget?  A scrollable widget?  The weeks being scrollable with swipe gestures?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: No problems so far. Just what i was looking for
reviews.author: Brad Stanley

reviews.title: Recommended!
reviews.comment: Great App.  But wish I can sync with other samsung devices.
reviews.author: juan figueroa

reviews.title: Please add hourly pay for shifts
reviews.comment: It\'s a nice simple app. Needs to be more flexible for privous weeks. I would really like it if they added pay and a punch in and our feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but
reviews.comment: Add the ability to count the hours you work until your pay instead of just counting how many hours you work a week
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I\'ve been needing!!! Thanks so much :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Just needs to be able to email and would be perfect x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of money!
reviews.comment: I put in 9-5 and it for some reason changes it to 7-3. I can\'t no matter what I try get it to read the proper times.. and it won\'t!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Only problem I\'m having is going to the previous week to see how many hours I have, and I wish it totalled my pay for my paychecks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Geniuose!
reviews.comment: This is the best and and simpliest! ......Others are confusing and useless! Well if u can make DAY OFF button instead of typing it on notes all the time its perfect! Other than that exellent app keep it up and dont mess it up!   :)
reviews.author: A Google User
